Class JitterMatrix

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.cycling74.jitter.JitterObject
        |
        +--com.cycling74.jitter.JitterMatrix
public class JitterMatrix
extends JitterObject

JitterMatrix is a java wrapper for the Jitter Matrix object

Author:
Joshua Kit Clayton
